'''The Gourmet Supremos''' is a series of [[World Quests]] and [[Commissions]] in [[Inazuma]]. It revolves around the titular [[Gourmet Supremos]], a group of three people from around [[Teyvat]] with an interest in local cuisines.

==Quests==
===World Quests===
# [[Gourmet Supremos, Assemble!]]
# [[The Gourmet Supremos: Of Shrines and Sakura]]
# [[The Gourmet Supremos: The Seashore Strider]]
# [[The Gourmet Supremos: The Deep Divers]]
# [[The Gourmet Supremos: On the Road]]
# [[The Gourmet Supremos: The Importance of Eating Well]]
#* Requires the completion of the Xiangling ending of the commission [[The Gourmet Supremos: Breakthrough Thinking]].

===Commissions===
* [[The Gourmet Supremos: Breakthrough Thinking]]
* [[The Gourmet Supremos: Where'd the Ingredients Go?]]
* [[The Gourmet Supremos: Foodie Quiz]]
* [[The Gourmet Supremos: Cook-Off]]
* [[The Gourmet Supremos: Extreme Cookery]]

==Achievements==
The final World Quest and all Commissions except [[The Gourmet Supremos: Where'd the Ingredients Go?]] have associated ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievements.
